successes.title: SENIOR PROJECT - by Jeremy Lin, Executive Producer Alan Tam
successes.description: Five teenagers cram a year-long senior project into one last crazy weekend. Superbad meets Breakfast Club!

Pledges.description: You don't need material possessions to feel included in Senior Project. Here's a thank you email, and our spiritual connection will be more than enough. :)

You can't rush perfection. It took me forever to write "Senior Project" and you'll get to read it immediately for the low, low price of $10. A PDF version will be emailed to you with love on the day of release.
Decorate your room with Senior Project! We'll send you a download package with our Key Art including posters, DVD art, & More.
Be the first to see the film! We'll send you a digital download on the day of the release along with all the other rewards.

Get access to an exclusive album on Facebook! You'll get to see our beautiful faces during production all over your computer. It's almost as good as being there! Of course the rewards above are yours as well.
Not only will you get the above, you'll also receive a downloadable gag reel of Senior project!
Wear us out - get your own Senior Project T-Shirt!
This still comes with all the above rewards: Gag Reel, Facebook Album, Digital Download of the final film, Art Package, & Script!
Get ready for production! We'll send you a digital copy of a few pages from the storyboards. See what we're about to film before it happens. This is on top of all the above.

Go for broke with our Signature Package. We'll send you a signed DVD and Poster of the film.
You'll also receive all the rewards above.

You're in the movie (sort of)! Fool your friends and family with a photoshop of you in a frame of the final film. One step closer on your walk-of-fame.
You'll also receive all the rewards above.

It's almost like you're there! For one day on set we will set up a live stream of production so you can sit behind the monitors and catch all the action. Of course all the other rewards above are included.
We simply cannot thank you enough. You'll get all of the above, plus an end credit. Yes, you'll see your name on the big screen, under Special Thanks!

For this kind of support we want you to be part of the creative process. The Director or Producer will Skype with you during production.
You'll also receive all the rewards above.

Be a featured extra in our movie. Spend the day on set, eat lunch with the cast and crew. When the director calls Action!, it's time for you to shine! Of course, this comes with all of the above rewards.

You're already in the film, might as well go to the premiere! We want you to join us at the LA premiere.
You'll also receive all the rewards above.
